Planks Training.name: Standard Forearm Plank
Planks Training.description: Hold a plank position on your forearms, keeping your body straight.

Planks Training.name: High Plank
Planks Training.description: Hold a plank position on your hands, similar to the top of a push-up.

Planks Training.name: Side Plank
Planks Training.description: Support your body on one forearm while keeping your body aligned.

Planks Training.name: Side Plank with Reach-Through
Planks Training.description: Perform a side plank and twist your torso, reaching under your body.

Planks Training.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
Planks Training.description: In a high plank, tap your opposite shoulder while keeping your core stable.

Planks Training.name: Dynamic Plank
Planks Training.description: Move between forearm and high plank positions in a controlled motion.

Planks Training.name: Plank with Leg Lift
Planks Training.description: Hold a plank and lift one leg at a time to increase difficulty.

Planks Training.name: Plank with Arm Lift
Planks Training.description: Hold a plank and lift one arm at a time to challenge balance.

Planks Training.name: Reverse Plank
Planks Training.description: Sit with legs extended and support your weight with arms behind you.

Planks Training.name: Reverse Plank with Leg Lift
Planks Training.description: Hold a reverse plank and lift one leg at a time.

Planks Training.name: Elbow-to-Knee Plank
Planks Training.description: From a forearm plank, bring one knee to the opposite elbow.

Planks Training.name: Plank Walkouts
Planks Training.description: Start in a high plank and walk your hands forward, then back.

Planks Training.name: Plank Jacks
Planks Training.description: Jump your feet in and out while holding a plank position.

Planks Training.name: RKC (Hardstyle) Plank
Planks Training.description: Tense your entire body while holding a plank for increased intensity.

Planks Training.name: Superman Plank
Planks Training.description: Extend one arm and the opposite leg while maintaining plank stability.

Planks Training.name: Explosive Plank Push-Up
Planks Training.description: Start in a plank and push up explosively to a high plank.

Planks Training.name: One-Arm Side Plank
Planks Training.description: Perform a side plank while keeping one arm extended overhead.

Planks Training.name: Plank with Hip Dips
Planks Training.description: Lower your hips side to side while holding a plank to target obliques.

Planks Training.name: Plank to Pike
Planks Training.description: Transition from a high plank to a pike position and back.

Planks Training.name: Hollow Body Hold
Planks Training.description: Hold a position with your lower back on the floor and arms and legs lifted.

Planks Training.name: Star Plank
Planks Training.description: Perform a high plank with hands and feet spread wide.

Planks Training.name: Wall Plank Hold
Planks Training.description: Hold a plank position with your feet pressed against a wall.

Planks Training.name: Single-Leg Side Plank
Planks Training.description: Perform a side plank while lifting the top leg to increase difficulty.

Planks Training.name: Crawling Plank
Planks Training.description: Move forward and backward while maintaining a plank position.

Planks Training.name: Explosive Side Plank Switch
Planks Training.description: Jump from one side plank to the other without touching the ground.

Planks Training.name: Arm Swings
Planks Training.description: Swing your arms forward and backward to loosen the shoulders.

Planks Training.name: Torso Twists
Planks Training.description: Twist your torso side to side to activate the core.

Planks Training.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
Planks Training.description: Arch and round your back to mobilize the spine and warm up the core.

Planks Training.name: Wrist Rolls
Planks Training.description: Rotate your wrists in circles to prepare them for supporting body weight.

Planks Training.name: Bird-Dog
Planks Training.description: Extend opposite arm and leg while on all fours to improve stability.
